title: Expand journal entry text to full width

requirements.text: Remove horizontal padding from the journal entry text content within entry cards so the text spans the full width of the card container, matching the width of the timestamp and action buttons above it

quotes: Can you make the text full width?

acceptanceCriteria: Journal entry text content extends to the full width of the entry card
Text width matches the width of the date/time stamp and edit/delete buttons above it
No left or right padding constrains the entry text within the card
Images and 'Add Photo' button remain properly positioned below the text

nonGoals: Changing the width of the entry card container itself
Modifying the entry form text input field
Adjusting padding for images or buttons within the entry card
